name: DataTransfer.getData
description: The DataTransfer.getData() method retrieves drag data (as a DOMString) for the specified type. If the drag operation does not include data, this method returns an empty string.

refs.description: The definition of 'getData()' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
